settings.title: The smarter way to shower.
settings.subtitle: It’s time to cut your water use without compromising your experience.

settings.title: Purification at its finest
settings.text: The robust filtration ensures hygiene comes first, making your shower water clean and clear.

settings.title: Better for you & the environment
settings.text: In a world with growing water stress, we need to cut our residential water use in half. Rainstick does more than that, saving you 80% water and 80% energy.

settings.title: Standout, beautiful design
settings.text: Everyone will know you have a RainStick…. and want one too.

settings.title: High flow & relaxing experience
settings.text: Recirculating and filtering your water means you can enjoy a high-pressure shower without guilt or compromise.

settings.title: Smart technology
settings.text: You now can track your water and energy savings in real-time, allowing you to know how much water and energy you’ve saved.

settings.title: Saving water & money
settings.text: Your shower now pays you back. Depending on your household use, as much as $500-$700 per year.

settings.title: We made RainStick to be different.

settings.announcement_text: Call attention to a special discount, feature, or promotion here.

settings.title: Stay in Touch
settings.text: Be the first to know about RainStick updates, when it's available and how you can pre-order. We promise not to spam you and only share information you would be interested in.

settings.title: Adjustable head
settings.text: Let your customers know what details set your product apart from the competition.

settings.title: TITLE GOES HERE
settings.text: Your hand wand is out of the way, leaving a sleek, designer-worthy look.

settings.title: TITLE GOES HERE
settings.text: High-pressure flow-rate, low impact on the environment.

settings.title: When and where can I buy RainStick?
settings.text: RainStick will be available for purchase on our website and through our install partners in 2021.  Be sure to sign up here to be one of the very first in your region to have access to RainStick.

settings.title: What is included with my RainStick purchase?
settings.text: RainStick comes to you as a packaged system inclusive of all of the necessary components for a high-pressure shower experience. We are working on installation videos that will be available on our website to walk you through through the process. Whether you are trying your hand at installation or are working with an installation partner, we will have your back every step of the way.

settings.title: What is the price of the shower system?
settings.text: We are finalizing our pricing which is dependent on taxes, currency, shipping etc. in a retrospective area. To be the first to find out pricing in your area, be sure to sign up here. RainStick provides a reduction in your monthly bills and a 3-4 years (dependent on local water and energy costs.)

settings.title: Can you tell me more about the filtration component of the shower?
settings.text:
Our proprietary filtration system allows for real-time recirculation and low maintenance. Rather than continually having to change out filters (which is costly and an environmental hazard), our filter has a long life. Water after your shower is free of bacteria, dirt and even viruses making it clean and clear. 


After the end of your shower, water goes down the drain and there is a flushing of the system. The next person in the shower does not use the same water, they use a new set of fresh water.

settings.title: I am a retailer / distributor / contractor / hotel and would like to offer RainStick
settings.text: Great! We would love to hear from you. Please reach out to us at hello@rainstickshower.com.

settings.title: What are the installation requirements?
settings.text: We are working towards a full installation and system requirements section on our website which will be available in 2021. Please check back shortly!

settings.title: Can RainStick be installed where there is a bathtub insert?
settings.text: Currently RainStick is available only for install directly into a tiled shower floor. We are looking into making different versions for different applications in the future including bathtubs. Stay tuned!

settings.title: Does RainStick have a handheld?
settings.text: Yes! The foot spout doubles as a retractable handheld. Water can be diverted from the shower head to the lower handheld with the push of a button.

settings.title: Is the same water reused between showers?
settings.text: No. A shower session always begins with a fresh batch of clean water. In addition RainStick is equipped with an automated self-cleaning feature that cleanses the system between sessions.

settings.title: How It Works
settings.text:
RainStick system uses a patent pending technology. Components are designed for compatibility and durability so you don’t need to continually change out filters every few months to ensure clean water.

Our system is inherently:

• Low maintenance
• Has a straightforward installation
• Durable with a 2-year warranty
settings.hotspot_1_content: Fully adjustable shower head delivers high flow relaxation
settings.hotspot_2_content: The heater boosts water temperature to deliver constant comfort
settings.hotspot_3_content: Smart controller tracks water usage and ensures your system is operating perfectly to deliver every last drop
settings.hotspot_4_content: Foot spout that doubles as a retractable handheld to deliver options for a targeted experience
settings.hotspot_5_content: Long-life filtration cleans and purifies in real-time; supplying shower water that is safe for reuse
settings.hotspot_6_content: Prescreen captures anything too large to enter the systems

settings.title: Meet the Inventors
settings.text:
Inventors, Sean and Alisha, grew up in an area of water stress and were tired of heating up 100 litres of water during their shower and seeing it go down the drain. When speaking with others, they learned a lot of people were upset about the situation too so they decided to do something about it. 

Today, they’re on a mission to make saving water irresistible.

settings.title: Elevate your shower experience
settings.description: Re-invent your shower with 2X the flow rate and up to 80% water and energy savings.

settings.title: The smarter way to shower
settings.description: Track your water and energy savings in real time with WiFi-enabled technology. The only thing this system can’t do, is tell you when to shower, but we’re sure you’ve got this.

settings.title: Pay back time
settings.description: Showering is one of the top water-consuming activities in your home. Find out how much money you can save with RainStick.

settings.title: Specifications
settings.content:
Water Flow Rate: In circular mode, 11.4 LPM (3 GPM) - default mode In conventional shower mode, 6.8 LPM (1.8 GPM)
In-floor Reservoir: Included with system
Finishes: Matte Black and Brushed Nickel
Electrical Supply: 120 Volt, 15 AMP GFCI
Showerhead: Rain shower head, 10 inch wide
Handheld: Optional, available as an add on feature
RainStick app: Available for android and IOS, system compatible with Google Home & Alexa
Cleaning cycle: Automatic
Assembly: RainStick comes pre-assembled with the exception of the pump.

settings.title: Warranty
settings.content: 2 years with extended warranty plan option

settings.title: What's Included
settings.content:
RainStick is ideal for new builds and remodel projects and comes pre-assembled with the exception of a provided reservoir that requires installation into a tiled shower floor. Your RainStick Shower will be delivered complete with everything you need to get started, including:
  • System
  • Shower head & (optional if purchased) handheld shower
  • Phone & email installation support
  • RainStick Care Instructions

settings.content_one: To start, check your bathroom set up to ensure you have (or will have) (1) a tiled bathroom surface and (2) a shower stall as RainStick is not compatible with bathtub inserts or shower floor plates.
settings.content_two: Pre-Order your RainStick now with a $100 refundable deposit. We will contact you once it’s time to pay the remainder of your bill. At that time you will also be able to select the finish of your RainStick. RainStick will Ship in mid 2022.
settings.content_three: You will receive a RainStick system inclusive of all parts and sub-floor reservoir, ready for installation by your preferred bathroom professional.

settings.question: Does RainStick heat the water as it is recirculated?
settings.answer: Yes, RainStick adds a small amount of heated fresh grid supplied water that refreshes the loop and keeps the heat warm as is circulates.

settings.question: I usually turn off the tap between shampooing and soaping to conserve water. Will I no longer have to do this with my RainStick?
settings.answer:
RainStick uses over 80% less water per shower session. To put that number into perspective, a traditional 10-minute shower in North America uses approximately 100L of water and RainStick uses approximately 15 liters. Because the system circulates and cleans in real time, you're less worried about turning off the tap while shampooing.

Additionally, because of circulation we are also not dependent on what the grid supplies and can boost the flow rate. A traditional shower has a flow rate of 1.8-2.2 GPM (depending on the municipality) and RainStick's is approximately 3 GPM.

settings.question: Do I have to use WiFi?
settings.answer: A WIFI Connection is not mandatory but we do recommend using WiFi for the full user experience of RainStick. When not connected to WiFi, some key features such as remote software updates, descaler replacement cycles and the ability to track water and energy savings will not be available.

settings.question: What happens if the power goes off?
settings.answer: A power connection is required in order to operate the RainStick Shower.

settings.question: Do you have a solution for bathtubs?
settings.answer: Not yet, but we are looking into making different versions for different applications. Stay tuned to see what is coming in the future. Be among the first to know, sign up for our newsletter here.

settings.question: Can I control temperature, flow and operations made by voice command?
settings.answer: Yes, a virtual assistant (Alexa or Siri) allows you to turn RainStick on. Our RainStick app allows you to monitor maintenance, temperature control and water savings.

settings.question: How does RainStick clean the water in real time?
settings.answer:
RainStick water goes through a 3-stage process that removes larger hair and debris, and even kills bacteria and viruses.

The 3 Stages

1. Through the use of a micron filter, larger debris, including hair and dirt, is removed.
2. RainStick continuously refreshes with a tiny amount of hot water to cleanse the loop of shampoo and soap.
3. For redundancy purposes, an intense, long-life UV-LED is used, which disinfects water from any bacteria or viruses from the shower. The system does not store water in-between sessions.

At any time, you can also select the traditional shower mode if cleaning the shower stall or washing a pet for example.

Learn more about how RainStick Works here

settings.question: What happens if someone pees during a shower?
settings.answer: Firstly, stop peeing in the shower ;) RainStick has two modes (1) circular mode where water recirculates through the system and (2) traditional mode where water goes directly from the showerhead down the drain. In both modes, RainStick continues with 3-stage cleansing that includes UV treatment to address bacteria and viruses, a 200 micron pre-screen and continuous hot water to refresh the loop in real-time.

settings.question: Does RainStick use greywater?
settings.answer: No, RainStick uses fresh grid supplied water for every shower. When your shower is done, water goes down the drain. RainStick does not store water in the system between sessions and the system automatically cleans itself in between sessions.

settings.question: Am I using someone else's water?
settings.answer: No! Every user gets fresh grid supplied water for their shower. Once you're done, the water goes down the drain and the system undergoes an automatic cleaning cycle that sets up for the next user.

settings.question: What are the finishes?
settings.answer: For our limited 2022 production run we are offering a brushed nickel and matte black finish.

settings.question: What's included with my RainStick purchase?
settings.answer: RainStick arrives inclusive of all of the necessary components for a high-flow shower experience including the appliance, a shower head and a sub-floor reservoir.

settings.question: How often do I need to purchase the RainStick Original Cleaning Product?
settings.answer: The RainStick Original Cleaning product will needed to be topped up on average monthly. We are providing 6 months worth with the purchase of your RainStick.

settings.question: Where is RainStick availble for order?
settings.answer: RainStick is available to pre-order in North America. If you're not in North America, be sure to sign up to our international waitlist found here and we'll be sure to let you know when RainStick is available in your region.

settings.question: I want a RainStick but it's not availlable near me, what can I do?
settings.answer: We do have an international waitlit found here that you can join to be kept in the loop of when RainStick will be available near you.

settings.question: Do you have handheld option available for purchase?
settings.answer: Yes, RainStick comes with an optional handheld. We’ve found from speaking with a lot of people, some people use handhelds while others do not. The choice is yours to include a handheld with your RainStick purchase.

settings.quote: As parents and now grandparents, we always think about how we can leave the world a better place. RainStick helps us do our part, leave a legacy....and doesn't make us compromise on a great shower!
settings.name: Bruce Hicks

settings.contentone:
Never before has it been possible to shower with up to 80% less water, and still get a high-flow experience—all from the comfort of your own home.

This is the default mode for RainStick, using the drop up to 6X before it heads down the drain.
settings.contenttwo:
Should you ever wish to not use RainStick’s powerful, water-saving capabilities, just switch back to this mode, and your shower will do exactly as it did before. 

The water drop is used 1X, providing a low-flow 1.8 GPM experience.

settings.header:
How the RainStick
Shower works for you.
settings.paragraph_one: RainStick is the best investment you’ll make in a bathroom new-build or remodel project. It will provide an attractive ROI (return on investment) by paying back in 5 years or less.
settings.paragraph_two: Just like your current shower, RainStick starts with fresh grid-supplied water. Except, instead of going down the drain, RainStick captures, circulates, and cleans the water, all in real-time to avoid waste.

settings.column_content_one: RainStick provides almost double the flow rate of a conventional shower. California and Washington have mandated 1.8 GPM and RainStick's flow rate is 3 GPM.
settings.column_content_two: RainStick offers a full-coverage rainshower experience that actually washes the shampoo out of your hair, while still providing up to 80% water savings.
settings.column_content_three: RainStick keeps you warm and comfortable for the duration of your shower. Whether you like to shower at 38°C/100°F or 42°C/106°F for example, the option is yours to pick your preferred temperature.
settings.stages_content: RainStick goes through a 3-stage cleaning process that removes larger hair and debris, and even bacteria and viruses.
settings.list_one: Through the use of a micron filter, larger debris, including hair and dirt, is removed.
settings.list_two: RainStick continuously refreshes with a tiny amount of hot water to cleanse the loop of shampoo and soap.
settings.list_three: For redundancy purposes, an intense, long-life UV-LED is used, which disinfects water from any bacteria or viruses from the shower.
settings.stages_content_two: The system does not store water in-between sessions. At any time, you can also select the traditional shower mode if cleaning the shower stall or washing a pet for example.

settings.content:
RainStick began because (like most of us) we loved long, hot showers but felt guilty about wasting water. The only option at the time was a low-flow compromise, which would negatively impact our shower experience, a change we weren’t willing to consider. So we started to re-imagine status-quo and the way that we showered.

In 2019, we invented RainStick Shower – a WiFi-enabled shower system that not only saves up 80% energy and 80% water, and is low maintenance, but also increases the flow rate by 2X compared to a traditional shower.

settings.title: Mission
settings.content: We've made it our mission to provide fantastic experiences while contributing to a healthy planet, one RainStick at a time.

settings.title: Values
settings.content:
While our community are the true heroes, we share values of being true change agents to the world around us in order to leave it better than we found it.

Our vision is to allow people to thrive using only 50L of water per person, per day. A RainStick Shower is the beginning, to amazing things ahead.

settings.line_two: We nurture a culture of caring.
settings.line_three: We believe in doing what is right, not what is easy.
settings.line_four: We never settle for less than exceptional.
settings.line_six: Together, we will make a difference.

settings.content: Inventors, Sean and Alisha, grew up in an area of water stress and were tired of heating 100L of water during their shower and seeing it literally go down the drain, each and every time. When speaking with others, they learned a lot of people were upset about the situation too so they decided to do something about it. With collective backgrounds in business, water management and engineering, they are on a mission of making saving water irresistible. When not developing RainStick and trying to save the world one revolutionized shower at a time, Sean and Alisha are avid mountain bikers, travellers and music lovers.

settings.header: Wonderful! Thanks for letting us know. Since you care most about smart home tech, you may be really interested in the following:
Wonderful! Thanks for letting us know. Since you care most about design, you may be really interested in the following:
Wonderful! Thanks for letting us know. Since you care most about sustainable living, you may be really interested in the following:

settings.paragraph: Today, every 10-minute, conventional shower in North America uses approximately 100L of heated water. That’s equivalent to approximately 200 water bottles worth of water used during each shower, not only incredibly wasteful and carbon intensive but also expensive. RainStick solves the problem of water and energy waste in the home. Our WiFi-enabled circular shower system saves up to 80% energy and 80% water while providing almost 2X the flow rate of a low flow option.

settings.title: Exquisite Design
settings.content: You deserve a shower experience that is parallel to the way you live your life – smart and with purpose. RainStick Shower revolutionizes our relationship to water without compromising on design, performance, or your expectations. Encased in utter and pure beauty, it complements any exceptional design.

settings.title: Wifi Enabled
settings.content: RainStick’s WiFi-enabled, smart tech allows you to track your water and energy savings quickly and conveniently. You can also monitor your water usage and maintenance requirements. Heck, Siri and Alexa will even turn your shower for you.

settings.title: Sweet Savings
settings.content: Our circular shower system saves up to 80% energy and water while providing almost 2X the flow rate. You’ll save money without lowering your expectations. A real-time cleaning process ensures refreshed, clean water with each shower experience. You can also simply select the traditional shower mode, at any time.

settings.name: Ron Miller
settings.quote: You deserve a shower experience that is parallel to the way you live your life – smart and with purpose. RainStick Shower revolutionizes our relationship to water without compromising on design, performance, or your expectations. Encased in utter and pure beauty, it complements any exceptional design.
